Data: 1.25pm Phenomenal atmosphere as Gilchrist comes in to bat for the last time at his home patch after Ponting won the toss and batted.
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run off the mark with a straight drive and roared all the way
Vaas to Hayden, 2 runs a strong muscled drive and they come back for an easy two
Vaas to Hayden, no run a drive out to mid-off, but straight to the fielder
Vaas to Hayden, no run pushed through on the off-side once more
Vaas to Hayden, no run tight line once more, on off, a good length, and it's defended strongly on the front foot
Vaas to Hayden, no run good length again, pitching just outside off and some delicious shape away - but the batsman's not moved, letting the ball through
Malinga to Gilchrist, FOUR runs too wide outside off, no footwork there as Gilchrist drives hard through the covers - that was pure timing
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run straight ball, at 145kph, up there and defended from outside off with a sturdy shot
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run swivelled right onto the dot by Malinga, the batsman moving into the line on off and defends right behind the ball on the back foot
Malinga to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, a good length, but worked on the back foot with a touch to mid-off
Malinga to Hayden, no run great length, pushed past the left hander and brushed just past the outside edge down the corridor
Malinga to Hayden, no run on off, more good length, and defended tidily
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run up there outside off, the batsman looks to squeeze it out to midwicket with a turn of the wrist but stops on the shot
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run at 121.9kph, good-length ball again, on off, and defended once more
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run came back in off the seam from just outside off to in line with the off-stump and the ball defended yet again
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run comes forward, looking to defend, gets a thick outside edge through the third man region, controlled down so no alarms
Vaas to Hayden, 2 runs overpitched on leg, and you can't bowl there to him, the batsman quick to bring his hands down on to the ball, clunking it out to midwicket and they come back for two
Vaas to Hayden, no run not a moment for Hayden to treasure, coming out, looking to drive through extra and stops on the shot, an action which scoops the ball up invitingly but without too much alarm
Malinga to Gilchrist, FOUR runs overpitched on off and Gilchrist gets down on one knee and swings the ball through the covers with a full follow-through

Malinga to Gilchrist, no run pushed across the left hander, with a touch of away movement too and played down off the back foot to the gully region where it's well picked up by Dilshan with a left-hand stretch of a dive
Malinga to Gilchrist, 1 run on off, worked into short midwicket
Malinga to Hayden, no run straighter delivery on off, the batsman straightens up to get inside the line of the ball and defends

Malinga to Hayden, OUT extra pace from Malinga, straight and short, Hayden tangles himself up looking to bunt it from outside off through midwicket, doesn't get over it whatsoever and the ball scoops up to Farveez Maharoof
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run short on off, defended on the back foot into the covers
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run short on off again and played back down

Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run shortish ball on off, pushed towards mid-off and calls them through for the single, it's a far from comfortable one though, mind, as Jayasuriya comes round and throws towards the non-striker's sticks
Vaas to Ponting, no run on off, short, and played out to point in a half-defensive manner
Vaas to Ponting, no run across the right hander who comes down without convincing as his bat skews in his hands as he defends on the front foot
Vaas to Ponting, no run defended again
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run defended straight back to the bowler this time
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run outside off, driven to mid-off and there's no chance of a run
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run short outside off and cut down off the back foot to short point where Dilshan tidies up well and gets a low-five from Kapugedera for his efforts
Malinga to Gilchrist, FOUR runs outside off, a touch short, and it's a vintage Gilchrist - enjoy them while you can - a hard drive through the covers
Malinga to Ponting, 1 wide a height-related wide, banged in very short and it goes very high - more than a metre above his head even if he was standing up, but Ponting ducks just for good measure
Malinga to Ponting, 1 run no appeal as the ball cuts back in from outside off and catches the inside edge
Vaas to Ponting, no run outside off, and pushed into the covers
Vaas to Ponting, no run stays over the wicket, pushes that past the right hander
Vaas to Ponting, no run pushed past him again, the ball moving away off the pitch wider past the right hander whose leave is extravagant
Vaas to Ponting, 3 runs down on one knee to greet the ball outside off, swishes it with a flick through midwicket. He didn't have much room for that but it goes to the ropes
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, rising delivery, worked wide of mid-off and they run through an easy single
Vaas to Ponting, FOUR runs room outside off and Ponting launches into that one with a flaying, flowing drive through the covers. Great shot, he's already looking more comfortable
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run on off, tidy delivery and defended on the back foot
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run room outside off in theory but the length's too good, cramping Gilchrist whose hand comes off the bat as he looks to push to point
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run more room, tries to work hard to the covers, but plays right into the ground
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run pushed up there on off, played down
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run on middle and off, well bowled again, and all the batsman can do is defend in front of his stumps
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run pushed across the left hander, room outside off, Gilchrist chops into the ground and that rounds off an excellent maiden
Vaas to Ponting, no run right up there on off, and played forward for yet another dot
Vaas to Ponting, no run defended on the back foot
Vaas to Ponting, no run short on off and once again defended on the back foot
Vaas to Ponting, no run slower ball, coming back in and once more defended
Vaas to Ponting, no run driven hard to the covers, where it's snapped up
Vaas to Ponting, 1 run turned off the legs to midwicket for the only single off the over
Malinga to Ponting, no run outside off, driven hard to mid-off, but straight to the player
Malinga to Ponting, FOUR runs terrific shot for Ponting, getting over the ball on the off-side and pushed in front of midwicket to shake off the single-figures bogey
Malinga to Ponting, 2 runs a better delivery this time, Ponting caught in two minds going for the pull shot, cramped and pushed in front of midwicket
Malinga to Ponting, 2 runs got that one away with an inside edge in front of square, trying to drive forward. Malinga's bowling too straight - especially given his off-side field
Malinga to Ponting, FOUR runs short ball banged in straight and Ponting somehow gets the bottom of the bat on it and he pulls it round through the 45
Malinga to Ponting, no run laced hard to point this time
Vaas to Gilchrist, FOUR runs outside off and the ball was at the rope almost as soon as it had been hit, Gilchrist lacing it square through point
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run a hint of curl away as the ball pitches on a good length on off
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run pushed up there on a good line and length, driven back out through straight mid-off to bring up the fifty
Vaas to Ponting, FOUR runs a huge outside edge dashes just wide of a diving first slip there, Jayawardene, the bowler doing well with the ball that shaped across him on a good length
Vaas to Ponting, no run defended this time
Vaas to Ponting, no run comes right out and defends strongly this time on off
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run overpitched on off, a cracking shot of a forward drive to mid-off, the fielder doing really well to come round, dive and roll - that was Dilshan with fast hands
Maharoof to Gilchrist, SIX runs hello, a controlled lofted drive over long-on that travels fast and flat two rows back
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run cuts hard to point
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 2 runs flays hard straight to midwicket where Malinga tidies up now
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run didn't time this one to mid-off
Maharoof to Gilchrist, FOUR runs short outside off, and ever so nearly a six as Gilchrist goes aerial again with another lofted drive, this time over straight long-on. He doesn't have to go does he?
Vaas to Ponting, OUT Ponting gets across but doesn't play either forward or back, instead guiding the ball to Jayawardene at first slip, who had predicted his downfall before this match
Vaas to Clarke, no run superb delivery, how about that one for a greeter? Bangs it in just short on miffle and the ball was through him, nipping off and away from him. Cracker
Vaas to Clarke, 1 run gets down and defends this time, and they shuffle through
Vaas to Gilchrist, FOUR runs strays on to the legs and turned round sharply through fine
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run short outside off, a touch of extra bounce, and Gilchrist leaps into the line to defend down off the back foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off and well bowled, slowed down a touch and the pace deceiving Gilchrist who drags an inside edge back past the leg stump
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run waits to see what the bowler's got, and he's got a ball which pitches on middle and off and invites the batsman to defend on the back foot, right back down the line
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run on middle and leg this time, swivelled round to square, at least that was the intention, the ball instead dropping down off the edge
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run slower ball, yorker too, well dug out towards straight long-on where there's some good, committed fielding there
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run horrible effort from Clarke there, coming out of his crease, flashing really hard and totally missing down the corridor
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run good judgement from Clarke this time, the ball cutting back a touch from outside off and leaping over the off bail, clearing it by some distance
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run another play-and-miss rounds off a good over by the bowler, Clarke's feet once again trapped as he looks to lash through the covers
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run comes right out and works the ball into short midwicket
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run outside off, good length, Gilchrist waits and defends on the front foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run good length again, up there, and defended on the back foot into the off-side
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run right up there in front of off, played into the ground onto the leg-side with a powerless drive
Vaas to Clarke, no run swing into the right hander from a ball which starts on middle and leg and ends up just outside leg, played down into short midwicket
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run on middle and leg, worked into short miwicket, Vaas throws himself down to stop it
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run outside off, defended on the back foot
Kulasekara to Clarke, FOUR runs outside off, driven hard through mid-off with the full face of the blade and a high elbow
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run out of the crease again, on the back foot, and plays hard to Kapugedera just foward of point who does well once more
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run comes out and defends on the front foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run over the wicket, defended on the back foot in line with the ball
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run outside off, played on the up just short of Malinga at mid-off, a touch of pop there
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run right up there on off, a touch of movement in the air, defended on the front foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run right up there again on leg this time, played on the front foot into the leg side and no run's on
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run pushed out to mid-on this time and they run through
Vaas to Clarke, no run ripped through on a good line and length, just past the outside edge
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run right up there and played forward in a defensive manner

Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run across the left hander at a tight angle, Gilchrist goes back and pushes to short midwicket, there's no run but there is a good throw in from the fielder to the non-striker's
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run comes forward again, always attacking, but drives straight to the fielder at mid-off
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, SIX runs short and what a way to bring up the fifty, everyone's on their feet as he pulls hard, great eye there, in front of square
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run up there and played off the back foot, defensively
Vaas to Clarke, no run across the right hander, worked into the covers
Vaas to Clarke, no run on leg, driven back out to the bowler without much power
Vaas to Clarke, 2 runs comes out of the crease, driven to the covers
Vaas to Clarke, no run lets that one go across him, outside off and nips wider off the seam
Vaas to Clarke, no run pushed straight to the covers, Clarke finding it hard to find the gaps, and that's well bowled again
Vaas to Clarke, no run Clarke sets to defend and does so on the front foot
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, FOUR runs short and pulled round through wide of midwicket
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, FOUR runs right up there, overpitched though, driven hard and true along the floor through long-off
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run played off the legs into midwicket
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run nipped back in from outside off, pushed out to mid-on
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run banged in down a good length but wide outside off, and pulled hard but mistimed up to the circle on leg, wide of mid-on
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run comes out and drives to mid-off
Murali to Gilchrist, no run Murali dances slowly up to the sticks, as usual, and plants the ball on a good length in line with off, Gilchrist defends
Murali to Gilchrist, 2 runs pushed across him again and driven out straight to mid-off, with cheers from the crowd as the hundred comes up
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run down leg, swivelled off the legs behind square for a gentle single
Murali to Clarke, 1 run outside off, turns in a touch, and Clarke guides the ball out on the front foot with an easy drive to the legs
Murali to Gilchrist, no run outside leg, pitches there, and comes back in to middle, a half-shout
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run on leg, turned round behind square
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 2 runs low full toss drops towards the off-stump and it's driven back out to mid-off, didn't quite get hold of it
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run round the wicket by the way, Gilchrist drives into the ground once more outside off
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run on middle and leg, Gilchrist picks it off a full length and pulls round hard behind square
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run short ball down off has Clarke pulling out of any thoughts of playing it, with a sway back
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run driven into the gap in the covers for a quick single
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run starts wideish of the crease, sends one down off and it nips back in a touch, defended on the front foot
Murali to Clarke, no run down leg, and turned into the leg-side quietly, no run there
Murali to Clarke, 1 run fizzes it outside off, good length, pushed into the covers off the back foot with a gentle dab
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run fuller delivery, and a better line outside off, straightening through, Gilchrist on the back foot pushes into the covers
Murali to Clarke, 1 run worked forward for a comfortable single
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run comes out and controls the push back out in front of midwicket
Murali to Clarke, no run cuts hard over the ball, away from the body, and didn't quite get hold of it, not connecting at all in fact
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, FOUR runs tremendous shot, the ball served up outside off and without bouncing, Gilchrist helps himself to a full-blooded drive through the covers
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run tucked from outside off, off the legs to midwicket
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run outside off, a touch full, and driven out to mid-off
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run outside off and Clarke doesn't get hold of the pull shot, a la Hayden earlier, just rushed on to that one and it lands short of midwicket
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run the bowler gets away with one which bends in at the left hander on the full and is laced to the covers
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run outside off, full delivery pitches just in front of his toes, not quite a yorker, and he drives into the ground, the ball bouncing up and landing in front of mid-off
Murali to Clarke, 1 run plenty of loop there, Clarke shuffles out to drive to the off, and they run through an easy single
Murali to Gilchrist, no run stays over, Gilchrist comes out and makes that one a decent-length delivery with a drive forward
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run unconvincing from Gilchrist this time as he gets down, takes it from outside off and sweeps right into the ground
Murali to Clarke, no run a tidy defence from Clarke who leans right over the ball and shows the full face of his bat
Murali to Clarke, 2 runs outside off and this time Clarke steers the ball through gully
Murali to Clarke, no run right up there on a good length outside off, the batsman gets right over the ball and defends
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 2 runs on leg, drags it a touch short and Gilchrist tucks it fine off the legs through down to fine leg
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run defended on the front foot now
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run dropped, rather, no attempt was made as Gilchrist tucks it high off his hips over to deep fine leg and Malinga has a refusal, not going for the dive forward
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run knocked forward this time
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run straight ball on middle and off, the batsman jumps into the line and defends back down off the back foot
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run driven back out to mid-off this time
Murali to Clarke, 1 run outside off, pushed off the back foot through the covers, the fielder just getting a hand to it
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run they'll settle for the single through mid-off now
Murali to Clarke, 3 runs outside off, great use off the feet as the batsman rocks back and cuts well through the covers, Jayasuriya does the fielding
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run outside leg, hardly any turn, Gilchrist gets over it and knocks the ball to midwicket
Murali to Clarke, no run looped in again and worked out to short midwicket
Murali to Clarke, no run fired right up there on middle, defended on the front foot
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run low full toss, tucked off the toes on the front foot through midwicket
Maharoof to Clarke, FOUR runs outside off, the ball rose and Clarke nearly chops an inside edge back on the stumps as he cuts on the back foot
Maharoof to Clarke, no run nips back in from outside off, the batsman waits and defends forward
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run outside off, slower than Clarke was expecting, so he waits and adjusts to the wideish delivery, playing it into the covers
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run right up there on off, tidy delivery, Gilchrist defends back down then rehearses the force through mid-on
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run on leg, a touch short, Gilchrist wrists it off the hips behind square and Malinga tidies up
Murali to Gilchrist, no run wide outside off, tempts Gilchrist to cut the air and nearly take the edge
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run driven hard to the covers this time, stopped by the fielder
Murali to Clarke, 1 run down the track and Clarke drives out to mid-on, just working the ball around here
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run on middle, Gilchrist waits and heaps it in front of midwicket with an easy back-foot steer
Murali to Clarke, 1 run on middle, turned off the legs in front of midwicket
Murali to Gilchrist, no run outside off, full ball, Gilchrist meets with a front-foot defensive
Maharoof to Clarke, no run outside off, driven to the covers

Maharoof to Clarke, no run outside off, driven hard to the covers, Gilchrist is out of his crease but sent back firmly by Clarke, a good call but nearly too late as Jayawardene nearly shies down the stumps. He would have been out
Maharoof to Clarke, no run driven forward once more, still no run
Maharoof to Clarke, no run nipped back in from outside off, played on the front foot with defensive intent
Maharoof to Clarke, FOUR runs slower ball outside off and Clarke smashes it through extra cover on the front foot, using the extra length well. The ball appeared to speed up as it reached the rope
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run good recovery, tight, driven to the covers and they run through, the ball again coming to Gilchrist's end as he makes his ground
Malinga to Clarke, no run down the corridor outside off, good length, Clarke lets it fly through
Malinga to Clarke, no run good yorker, up there on off, and the batsman clamps the ball into the covers on the front foot
Malinga to Clarke, no run bangs it in down off, the ball pitching and moving out a touch off the seam, the batsman chasing after it with a back-foot cut and the ball flies over
Malinga to Clarke, no run good swing up there, the yorker again moving onto the legs, and dug out with a last-gasp bat
Malinga to Clarke, no run on off, waits and defends back down off the back foot
Malinga to Clarke, FOUR runs on middle, another would-be yorker and Clarke punctures the pressure with a lovely guide off the legs in front of midwicket
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 2 runs turned off the legs and that's the Australia superstition, 87, which is 13 from 100
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 wide down leg, Gilchrist follows it, a tad too late, luckily for him as he didn't get a touch on it
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run pushed into the covers
Maharoof to Clarke, no run nips back in from outside off, pushed into the covers
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run played forward
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run leaps on to the back foot to defend back into the covers
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run on off and middle, turned off the legs in front of square
Malinga to Gilchrist, 1 run overpitched on off and Gilchrist drives forward straight through mid-off and it's picked up inside the long-off rope
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run up there on off, pushed into the covers on the front foot, Gilchrist just about in his crease as the throw came through
Malinga to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, dug out into the covers
Malinga to Clarke, no run Clarke turns his body to meet that one on leg and defends on the front foot
Malinga to Clarke, no run backs away and Malinga follows him outside leg, Clarke squaring up behind it with a front-foot defensive
Malinga to Clarke, no run short ball on leg fires into Clarke's rib-cage and he is in some pain as he falls to the floor immediately having missed the defensive
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run straight delivery, the batsman goes into line and defends off the back foot
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run down leg, Gilchrist turns it down fine to fine leg where Sangakkara runs down to pick it up
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run outside leg and a brave Clarke soldiers on, turning that one down fine
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run on middle and leg, rising, played back down towards the bowler off the back foot

Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run slower delivery, turned off the legs to short midwicket and there was a single there but Clarke sends him back, Maharoof finding the mix-up amusing - Clarke is keen not to run Gilchrist out right now
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run pushed to the covers, picks out the fielder there
Murali to Clarke, no run up there and defended on the front foot
Murali to Clarke, 1 run full low delivery up there on off, played off the front foot to mid-on
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run pushes Gilchrist on to his back foot and hs turns it into short midwicket
Murali to Clarke, 1 run outside off, Clarke backs away, exposes his stumps and cuts it to point
Murali to Gilchrist, no run on off, nipped a touch away off a good length, worked into the off-side
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run comes down and drives out to mid-on where there was nearly another mix-up, instead they decide not to go for the second
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run defended on the front foot
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run goes to pull it through midwicket, gets the toe-end of the bat on what's hardly a fully struck pull
Maharoof to Clarke, no run outside off, rises up and is defended back down
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run on off, rises up and is tucked down into the covers, they run through
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run outside off, Gilchrist flashes hard at a cut, didn't get the top edge, contrary to Sangakkara's vociferous appeal
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run drags it short, cut hard through point to bring up a strike-stealing single
Murali to Clarke, OUT beautiful doosra and out comes Clarke, drawn forward, and off come the bails, Sangakkara quicker than a whippet
Murali to Symonds, 2 runs squirts down leg, Symonds turns it in front of a lunging square and gets off the mark immediately
Murali to Symonds, 1 run an appeal as one pitches on leg and turns a bit more, the half-appeal not given
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run comes out and turns off the legs to short midwicket
Murali to Symonds, 1 run outside off, doesn't really turn back in, Symonds steps out and pushes into the covers
Maharoof to Symonds, no run short ball, released straight and the batsman ducks as it goes through to the keeper
Maharoof to Symonds, (no ball) bobs his head under a straight, sharp and short one, and it's no-balled because of the height
Maharoof to Symonds, no run right up there and defended on the front foot
Maharoof to Symonds, no run pitches on off and middle on a good length, moves back in a touch, defended on the front foot
Maharoof to Symonds, OUT outside off, cuts hard at a wideish one, but under the ball and a woody-sounding click travels on to the keeper who takes a good tumbling catch low
Maharoof to Hussey, 1 run outside off, pushed to mid-off and pinches a single naughtily to Murali
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, a cut, but can only pick out the covers, so he will have the strike next over
Murali to Gilchrist, no run outside off, waits, and keeps the crowd guessing with a defensive on the back foot
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run he's got is this time! This is his century! He turns it from outside off to midwicket and the crowd cheer long and loud
Murali to Hussey, 1 run worked into the covers on the front foot but they settle for one
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run straight, full, and worked out in front of midwicket this time

Murali to Hussey, no run floated past him, the batsman coming out to meet it, Sangakkara gets the bails off but has he done so in time? The third umpire reckons he has, Hussey's back foot somehow straight back down
Murali to Hussey, 1 run a touch of turn, squeezed back out to the covers
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run waits on the back foot and defends there
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run pushed up there again and defended forward
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run starts from wide of the crease, angles it back on a good length outside off, defended back down
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run digs a yorker out to mid-off and it's tidied up well
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run on middle and leg, good length, squeezed into midwicket
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run straight one up there on middle and defended forward
Murali to Hussey, no run a premeditated reverse sweep for Hussey there and a clean gathering for the keeper could have been close stumping-wise
Murali to Hussey, 1 run worked out forward for a quick single
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run dropped by Kapugedera coming in off the rope at deep midwicket, he was a bit lazy coming in and drops it on the crouch
Murali to Hussey, no run defended forward
Murali to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to reverse sweep, then turns hockey player as he tries to dribble it back round
Murali to Hussey, 1 run driven out to mid-on
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run opens the face to guide the ball down to third man to bring Gilchrist back on strike

Malinga to Gilchrist, OUT Gilchrist is finally gone, trying to loft one over long-off and took a leading edge to the covers, Kapugedera holding on this time over his head, having dropped him last over
Malinga to Hussey, 1 wide left alone outside off, a wide veers wider
Malinga to Hussey, no run pushed through down the channel
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run dropped. Tharanga has put down a sitter at midwicket, the ball circling round his hands like on a roulette wheel, and he hangs his head in shame
Malinga to Hopes, 1 wide bouncer, and he ducks under
Malinga to Hopes, no run comes forward, squares up and the ball takes an outside edge but safe
Malinga to Hopes, no run defended forward now
Maharoof to Hussey, 2 runs down the track, a mistimed pull again from him
Maharoof to Hussey, 3 runs worked well for two through square and they collect an overthrow too, Jayasuriya has something to say about it, the bowler was nowhere near behind the stumps
Maharoof to Hopes, 1 run right up there on the back foot, pushed into the covers and they run through the single
Maharoof to Hussey, no run a swing and a miss for one outside off, Hussey trying to sweep to midwicket but gets it wrong
Maharoof to Hussey, 1 leg bye down the track and again unconvincing, the ball catching his thigh guard as he swivels, the ball bouncing just in front of the keeper
Maharoof to Hopes, 1 run goes for a huge aerial drive which isn't properly timed and so falls short of wide mid-on
Kulasekara to Hopes, OUT lifted from a short one outside off high and higher - the ball catching the toe end - and goes on over towards Jayasuriya who clings on, making no mistake
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run the single is squeezed out to mid-off, so Hogg will face his first ball
Kulasekara to Hogg, no run outside off, defended back down off the back foot, tidy delivery there
Kulasekara to Hogg, 1 run a single into the covers brings Hussey back onto strike
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run full ball outside off, a single pushed to mid-off and they set off immediately
Kulasekara to Hogg, 1 run slower ball, driven out to the covers for yet another single
Murali to Gilchrist, no run comes right out but kills the ball now with a creeping defence
Murali to Gilchrist, 2 runs drags it short and Gilchrist pulls hard in front of midwicket
Murali to Gilchrist, no run tight defence up there, squeezed down to gully
Murali to Gilchrist, 2 runs plenty of loop and Gilchrist comes out of his crease to drive hard wide of extra cover
Murali to Gilchrist, no run down the track, mistimes a drive out to mid-off
Murali to Gilchrist, 3 runs big air again, driven through Murali's legs, a nutmeg, and out to long-off where there's some sloppy fielding which allows an exta run
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, SIX runs shortish ball and that one goes very high and very long into the hill over at deep square leg
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run low full toss driven hard straight to cover like a rocket
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, late swing, cut down through third man and that was possibly a chance, ah but it didn't carry to the keeper
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run pushes him back, but he drives back out forward to mid-off to bring up the 200
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run fuller ball on off, driven up and over towards mid-on
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run outside off, cut down to third man for a single
Maharoof to Hogg, no run sharp bouncer well directed over middle, the batsman ducked accordingly
Maharoof to Hogg, 1 run on middle and leg, tucked down off the back foot towards mid-off
Maharoof to Hussey, 1 run on off and middle, shortish, tucked round to midwicket and they look for two
Maharoof to Hogg, 2 runs backed away behind the stumps, smart piece of bowling, as the ball followed him and he tried to run it out off the bat through third man on the rise but took the glove
Maharoof to Hogg, no run short and straight again, the batsman once more tries to run it fine and nearly helps it into Sanga's gloves, but didn't quite connect
Maharoof to Hogg, no run backs away and away and cuts hard but without completely timing it
Malinga to Hussey, SIX runs outside off, slightly short, and Hussey launches that high and very straight, right over the long-off ropes
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run tight ball, typical Malinga, up there on middle, defended forward
Malinga to Hogg, no run banged in short, the batsman backs away and cuts into the covers
Malinga to Hogg, OUT bowled him this time, Hogg backing away yet again and the perfect yorker cleans him up, clattering into all three stumps - strike.
Malinga to Lee, no run good ball to greet Lee, short and sharp and Lee does well to sway back from it
Malinga to Lee, no run short and bounces up off the glove, landing safe
Kulasekara to Hussey, OUT Hussey looks to hit across the line rather than straight and his would-be pull goes up instead to the covers where Jayawardene sets himself to take a straightforward catch
Kulasekara to Lee, no run outside off, horrible shot really, no footwork from Lee who swings and misses away from his body, aiming for the topspin lob
Kulasekara to Lee, 1 run outside off and Lee's swing connects this time with a drive to long-off where a good defensive throw keeps them to a single
Kulasekara to Johnson, OUT rising outside off, pushed out to mid-off and a straight throw from Dilshan crashes down the stumps to run out Johnson
Kulasekara to Lee, 1 run worked into midwicket this time
Kulasekara to Bracken, 1 run yorker, dug out straight
Malinga to Bracken, no run Bracken backs right away and was ready on the on-side but in came the slower ball and Malinga just slunk it down off, ever so nearly taking the stumps
Malinga to Bracken, no run ungainly swing and miss, trying to work it to the on-side

Malinga to Bracken, 1 bye follows him down leg, swing and miss from more backing away, they take the bye which is naughty and Sangakkara's huge underarm loop one-two with Malinga nearly results in the run-out at the non-striker's
Malinga to Lee, OUT cleaned up with another excellent yorker to finish the tail off well, Lee backing away, and Malinga firing in on leg stump

Great comeback job from Sri Lanka's bowlers there, Malinga ends with four well-deserved wickets. Good fielding throughout on the whole, with the exception of a few drops. Gilchrist did really well in his final ODI at the WACA with a well-worked hundred, replete with plenty of singles.

We're back with the run-chase. Sri Lanka did really well to pick up wickets in the end, keeping Australia down to less than five an over. A good start here and they may be on their way to a special win. The pitch has been bouncy, though, and the new-ball bowlers wouldn't want to let t
Lee to Dilshan, FOUR runs What a start! full and on the pads, Dilshan cutely flicks it over backward square leg for a four, superb innovation at the top of the order
Lee to Dilshan, no run short of a length and straight this time, Dilshan on the back foot and defending down the ground
Lee to Dilshan, 5 leg byes runs flowing freely here, they take a quick leg-bye to Haddin but a direct hit deflects off the stumps and runs away down the ground for four. Too easy first up.
Lee to Jayasuriya, FOUR runs spanked with the force of a marauder, short and wide from Lee and Jayasuriya upper-cuts it for four, a silence descends over the WACA, Sri Lanka on a roll
Lee to Jayasuriya, 3 runs wide again and Jayasuriya whacks it over the covers again, what a flood first up, lobs onto the outfield and they get three
Lee to Dilshan, no run short and slightly wide, 147kph, left alone, what an opening over for Sri Lanka, 16 off it.
Bracken to Jayasuriya, no run full and on off, cramped a bit for room, patted to the leg side
Bracken to Jayasuriya, no run full and on middle this time, no room for Jayasuriya, 134kph but accurate, pushed back down the ground
Bracken to Jayasuriya, no run straight again, pushed towards cover
Bracken to Jayasuriya, no run good accurate bowling again, full and no room, pushed down the ground to mid-off
Bracken to Jayasuriya, FOUR runs down the leg side and tucked away, four good balls and this one, slightly off the mark, has been put away, trickles away to fine leg for four
Bracken to Jayasuriya, 1 leg bye on the pads and cramping him for room this time, deflects off the legs
Lee to Jayasuriya, 1 run full and on off, Jayasuriya pushes to mid-off and races for a single
Lee to Dilshan, FOUR runs what a blitzer, full and on off, Dilshan smokes it off the front foot, super cover-drive for four and the WACA is too stunned here. Sri Lanka galloping away
Lee to Dilshan, no run short and pacy, 145kph, Dilshan goes for the pull shot but doesn't read the length well, deflects off the pads to the slip cordon
Lee to Dilshan, no run on the middle stump, batsman tries to force it to the leg side but he's cramped for room, sees the ball drop close to him
Lee to Dilshan, (no ball) short one from Lee, but that's a no-ball, Dilshan lets it go but sees the umpire signals a free-hit. Time to throw caution to the wind
Lee to Dilshan, 2 runs another short one, and a pull this time, ferociously latches on to it, can't time it well and picks up a couple to fine leg
Lee to Dilshan, no run short of a length, punched off the back foot

Bracken to Jayasuriya, OUT he's thrown it away, Jayasuriya charges down the track and tries to smack Bracken over extra-cover, can only get a thick outside edge, though, and pops a simple catch to third man. The fielder there is alert and nabs one of the most important wickets.

Bracken to Dilshan, 1 run full and angled away towards the covers, brilliant stop by Symonds (who else?) and Hussey picks it up in a flash and tries to throw towards the non-striker's end, Dilshan would have had to go if that was a direct hit
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run slightly outside off, left alone
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run pushed off the back foot, down the ground
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run nice carry to the wicketkeeper, left alone again

Bracken to Sangakkara, FOUR runs exquisite and four all the way, full and outside off, Sangakkara leans into the shot and creams it through the covers for a beautiful four, all along the carpet for a four
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 wide rusty start there, big wide outside off from Johnson, he's bowling against the wind so he will need to get used to that

Johnson to Dilshan, no run full and tapped to cover, the crowd thinks it's a catch but that was actually a bump ball, Symonds fumbles initially and gets in a direct hit, no point running on a misfield to him

Johnson to Dilshan, OUT castled! 142kph from Johnson and that's a yorker length ball that swings in late, Dilshan goes for the expansive drive but is beaten all ends up, through the gate, door and kitchen onto the middle and off stump. That sound of ball hitting stumps (tling) i
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full and on off, Jayawardene pushes to the covers and thinks of a run but Symonds is prowling there, dives and stops the single
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run left alone outside off, angling from the left-armers angle away from the right-hander
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short and nippy this time, 142kph, Jayawardene hurried by that one, drops his bottom hand right at the end as the ball trickles to the covers
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short of a length and pacy again, thick outside edge but along the ground to third man for a single, fine over from Johnson
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of a length and hurrying Jayawardene, pushed to the leg side but no run

Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs super shot, Lee digs it in slightly short but Jayawardene is upto the challenge, flicking his wrists and lifting over the slips for four, the third man is a bit too wide and he can't get to it. Good use of Lee's pace from Mahela that time
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run defended on the back foot
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of a length, pushed to the covers but there are usually no gaps there with Symonds lurking
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run good length and a bit wide, laced away superbly off the back foot but Hussey is at point, stopping what was a certain four
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run defended down the ground, not much pace off the pitch, looks like a good one for batting
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run full and on middle stump, Sangakkara walks across and whips it towards square leg. No single, though
Johnson to Sangakkara, 3 runs full and on middle stump again, Sangakkara is too wristy a player to miss out, smacks it towards midwicket for three
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run loose drive outside off, that ball was bowled to induce that shot, Mahela not moving his feet there
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run left alone, short of a good length ball outside off
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run straight and accurate, pushed off the back foot back to the bowler

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs dropped, by Ponting at second slip, Jayawardene flashes loosely, not much feet movement there and gets a healthy edge that flies towards second slip, Ponting lunges towards it but can only parry it away (goal-keeper style) to the third ma
Lee to Sangakkara, FOUR runs full and on off, spanked through cover for a gorgeous four, Sangakkara on the move here
Lee to Sangakkara, 3 runs full and on middle, clipped away towards midwicket for three, super shot again

Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full and on middle and leg, fast one there, Lee is confident of the lbw appeal but the umpire is not convinced, Jayawardene indicates that he might have got an inside edge to that one, that looked close
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs lazy and elegant and sensational, few batsmen drive better than this man and he's creamed Lee towards the covers for four
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run flashed hard and a thick edge flies away to third man for a single
Lee to Sangakkara, no run pushed to the off side, off the back foot
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run left alone outside off
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full and outside off, smashed to the covers but well fielded by Haddin, diving stop and a quick return
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run cramped for room, deflects off the pads to the off side
Johnson to Sangakkara, FOUR runs short and wide, Sangakkara latches on ferociously, moves into position and finds the gap through the covers, all the way for four, burns the grass
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run wafting outside off this time, they're throwing their bats at everything, thick edge past the slip to third man for a single
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run outside off and left alone
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run pushed to the off side
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run full and on off, pushed back to the bowler
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run left alone outside off
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run outside off again, Sangakkara shoulders arms
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run slightly slower this time, 127kph, pushed to the covers
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run and a maiden, shoulders arms and leaves it alone
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run forced across the right hander from over the wicket, enough angle on that to be left alone, which he does with a shrug
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed through tighter this time, on the rise and with a hint of curve away - like a supermodel's hips, so not much - and left alone
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs outside off, dragged short and with plenty of room for him to latch onto a thunderous drive that races over the turf backward of point
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs pushed across him once more, a touch of room and some width, again he goes square with a drive just in front of point now

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT but he's gone now, just as he was getting set, the ball pushed across him making him play, hint of movement off the seam and with some late swing once he was committed to the shot, taking a step and thick-edging to second slip where Ponting ma
Johnson to Silva, no run leaves his first ball through to the keeper
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run tight, ever so tight on off, forcing the front-foot defensive to a decent-length ball
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run left armer to left hander, pushed down straight outside off, Sangakkara waits and defends on the front foot

Bracken to Sangakkara, 5 runs nipped back fro outside off, pushed to mid-on and they get the single, Hogg has a go at the non-striker's end, it wouldn't have been out and the ball runs on for four overthrows
Bracken to Silva, no run defended on the front foot
Bracken to Silva, no run through him as he stabds a forward defensive and there's a cry from a noise as the bat hit the pad, certainly not the ball which leapt over the shoulder
Bracken to Silva, no run a more convincing forward defensive this time
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run outside off, Sangakkara comes forward and almost yorks himself outside the line to defend
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run devious swing back in towards the left hander but the ball's still just down the channel
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run down the channel again, more swing, the batsman is quick to shoulder arms and hold his bat high for a while making sure the ball has gone through. It had and then some
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run winged down off once more, a fraction wider, but the same results from the batsman - a leave
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run late swing away from the left hander, a good length too, and he waits before defending on the front foot
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run closer to the batsman this time, on off, rising and Sangakkara quickly kills any threat with a doughty defence
Bracken to Silva, no run slipped through down off
Bracken to Silva, no run once more across the right hander at 135kph, left alone again
Bracken to Silva, no run tight line on off, the batsman cautious in front-foot defence
Bracken to Silva, no run swing back in to the right hander who defends on the front foot
Bracken to Silva, no run outside off, a swing and a miss of a cut away from his body

Bracken to Silva, OUT outside off and there's a contender for catch of the season, Silva lashes a full-blooded cover drive to Symonds who pulls off an audacious take, diving low and really stretching out his left hand to get under it
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run defended first up
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run more good defence
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run steps outside the crease, and to the side, to defend on the front foot. Good ball there
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run over the wicket by the way, pushed across to him, defended again
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run pushed across him, plugging a tight line, and defended on the front foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run more of the same, a pushed defence travelling back to the bowler who scoops it up and looks for opportunities
Bracken to Kapugedera, 1 run short ball, good thinking, took him high and on the glove but the ball falls to ground and they scaramble through for one
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run pushed through outside off
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run bent back in from outside off, shuttling off the seam, and it's left
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run cut back in off the seam from an already slender line, Sangakkara defends solidly on the front foot
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run nips in again, keeping a very tight line, defended forward
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run pushes it through fuller, and demands a forward defence again
Hopes to Kapugedera, no run defended on the front foot
Hopes to Kapugedera, no run defended on the front foot
Hopes to Kapugedera, no run more defence
Hopes to Kapugedera, no run cuts back in a smidgen from outside off into line with off and the batsman defends on the back foot now
Hopes to Kapugedera, 1 run outside off, waits, and cuts down just wide of the slips, a controlled steer too
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run walks across the stumps, drives out on leg towards long-on
Lee to Sangakkara, no run starts well enough
Lee to Sangakkara, 1 run veering down leg, turned well round to fine leg
Lee to Kapugedera, no run short ball, well bowled
Lee to Kapugedera, no run outside off, cut down off the back foot to cover point
Lee to Kapugedera, no run down off, tight line, the batsman lets that one go through
Lee to Kapugedera, no run seemed to release that one late from his fingers, slanting it up fullish and driven out to the covers
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run rises up from a good length on off and is defended down
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run on middle and leg, tucked easily off the pads and some smooth running follows
Hopes to Kapugedera, 1 run outside off, good length, the batsman steps out of his crease to push to the covers
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run pushed through outside off, left alone
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run right up there and defended on the back foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run right up there and pushed back into the covers
Lee to Kapugedera, no run short ball fired in, hit the back arm and Kapugedera just stands there, hard as nails
Lee to Kapugedera, 2 runs turned off the legs into short midwicket
Lee to Kapugedera, no run pushed through outside off, left alone
Lee to Kapugedera, no run pushed through again outside off, but was a touch wide and the batsman could have tried to cut it
Lee to Kapugedera, FOUR runs outside off, and that's a shot and a half, the batsman just waiting and lifting a cover drive way on its way. Nice batwork
Lee to Kapugedera, no run short and wide down off, left alone once more
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run pushed across the left hander who defends on the front foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run outside off, turned into the leg-side to short midwicket
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run on off, turned towards short midwicket once again
Hopes to Kapugedera, no run nipped back in from outside off, defended down
Hopes to Kapugedera, 1 run outside off, played down to gully and thrown back in for a direct hit at the striker's end from the second slipper Ponting, but the batsman was well home
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run shot, Sangakkara pushing forward with a ramrod straight face of the bat back past the bowler
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run starts with one which pitches on off and middle, turns back out to off, and is in turn moved out to short midwicket
Hogg to Kapugedera, 2 runs turned back down off the outside edge to third man
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run defended on the front foot
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run comes out to swish outside off
Hogg to Kapugedera, 1 run driven out to mid-off
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run right up there on off, driven out to long-off
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run turned off the legs to midwicket without much fuss
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run rocks back into line outside off stump and performs a regulation back-foot defence
Hopes to Sangakkara, 2 runs on middle and off, turned back off the legs behind square
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run outside off, overpitched, and driven out to mid-off
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run pitched on off, driven out to mid-off for an easy single
Hopes to Kapugedera, no run short ball goes over the batsman's head as he ducks
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run up there on off, pushed back to mid-on on the toes and bring up the 100
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run up there on off, driven out to mid-on
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run right up there and defended on the front foot
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run beat the outside edge this time
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run up there and defended on the front foot
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run driven out square of point
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run pushed across the left hander, Hopes continues to be economical
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run gives him plenty of room to cut through the covers
Hopes to Kapugedera, no run nips back in to the right hander on off, defended tidily, Australia tightening their hold
Hopes to Kapugedera, no run outside off, driven hard back to the bowler, so straight it hit the stumps and crashed out to mid-on
Hopes to Kapugedera, 1 run pulled through midwicket this time
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run on middle and leg, turned off the legs to midwicket
Hogg to Sangakkara, no run this one really turned and squared him up, as well as pitching up, defended on the back foot
Hogg to Sangakkara, no run this time defended on the front foot
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run worked out from outside off to short mdiwcket where Hayden runs, gets a hand on it and then grabs it
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run on off, turned to short midwicket this time
Hogg to Kapugedera, 1 run driven out to mid-on, an easy steer of a single
Hogg to Sangakkara, no run waits on the back foot and defends in the line
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run played on the back foot back to the bowler
Johnson to Kapugedera, 1 run pushed forward
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 leg bye a half-shout for one which would have gone on down leg
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run defended this time
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run dropped. Another one, and this was Matthew Hayden at first slip as well, good pace on that, the batsman flashes hard to Hayden's left and it was on to him too quickly
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run driven straight to the covers
Hogg to Sangakkara, no run defended now
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run driven out to the covers this time
Hogg to Kapugedera, FOUR runs top timing through the covers and the ball races on
Hogg to Kapugedera, 1 run a touch of width and well played to midwicket
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run waited and driven out to mid-off this time
Hogg to Kapugedera, no run worked out again
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run worked out again outside off
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run big rise outside off, let that one pop through to the keeper
Johnson to Kapugedera, 1 run outside off, squares up and a thin outside edge goes past the waiting slips
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, rises, and played carefully into the covers off the back foot
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run outside off, dealt with fairly effectively
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run pushed across the right hander who plays it back down off the back foot defensively
Lee to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, walks into the line of the ball and tries to force it off the back foot
Lee to Kapugedera, 1 run paddled round to short midwicket this time
Lee to Sangakkara, 1 run on leg, a touch of room, turned round in front of square leg
Lee to Kapugedera, no run short ball, tucked down off the legs and they decide, wisely I expect, not to risk the single
Lee to Kapugedera, no run on middle and leg, good length, played back down
Lee to Kapugedera, 1 run tucked off the back foot well into the covers and it's well run in the end
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run driven out to the covers and tidily picked up
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run driven straight to Symonds at cover, no run
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run outside off, pushed down the line, left alone
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run pushed forward this time
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run and again
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run squared up and there's little he can do as he's pushed on to the back foot other than defend
Lee to Sangakkara, no run pushed through on the back foot now
Lee to Sangakkara, no run worked into the line and defends out towards mid-off
Lee to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off and Sangakkara leans forward into a drive of a thick edge down through the vacant slips and it's tidied inside the rope by the third man running round
Lee to Kapugedera, no run searing yorker at 152.5kph, well dug out
Lee to Kapugedera, 1 run full delivery, squeezed out to point and they run through
Lee to Sangakkara, 1 run banged in short, Sangakkara leans back limbo-like to flash a back-foot steer to third man and it bounces just in front
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, driven out through point and some good running results
Hopes to Kapugedera, 1 run nipped back in from outside off and squeezed out in front of square to bring up the fifty partnership
Hopes to Sangakkara, 2 runs Sangakkara steps forward, then back, and turns the ball behind square
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, chopped back down into the gully, for a quick single to bring up Sangakkara's well-worked fifty
Hopes to Maharoof, no run rocks back into the line in front of middle, defended down
Hogg to Sangakkara, no run tries for the sweep
Hogg to Sangakkara, no run defended now
Hogg to Sangakkara, 2 runs outside off, pulled to midwicket but doesn't get hold of it really
Hogg to Sangakkara, FOUR runs outside off, soft hands to guide it out to third man, and gets it past the fielder who runs on and crashes into the boards
Hogg to Sangakkara, no run right up there, defended on the front foot
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run driven forward to steal the strike after a useful over for Sri Lanka who still need around six an over
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run pushed across the left hander who defends on the front foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run pushed across the left hander with a hint of room outside off, driven out to the covers
Hopes to Maharoof, no run outside off and that's through him past the blade as he shapes to push from the back foot
Hopes to Maharoof, FOUR runs outside off, the batsman comes out of his crease and drives hard through the covers, that should have been stopped there by Haddin after Symonds missed it first up
Hopes to Maharoof, no run a defensive this time
Hopes to Maharoof, no run comes out, looking to attack but ends up defending on the front foot
Hogg to Sangakkara, 2 runs outside off, swept hard onto the leg side
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run driven forward this time
Hogg to Maharoof, 1 run a touch of width but some hard-to-deal-with bounce, nonetheless it's clipped with a cut to point off the back foot
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, gets right over the ball and drives through mid-off
Hogg to Maharoof, no run right up there on middle and off, pushed out to mid-on
Hogg to Maharoof, no run cracking ball pitches on middle and rips, while popping, past the outside edge
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run driven out forward, played well there
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, driven out to mid-off where a direct shy still wouldn't have been out
Hopes to Maharoof, no run outside off, driven to the covers this time
Hopes to Maharoof, no run outside off, the batsman comes out to meet the ball, drives to the covers
Hopes to Maharoof, 1 run banged in short and looped in the air off the bat with a scoop up to short square leg, the batsman not at all getting over it or controlling it
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, cut hard through third man
Hogg to Sangakkara, no run reaches right out to sweep right round to midwicket
Hogg to Sangakkara, 2 runs down the ground and Sangakkara chips well over long-off, just in front of Lee to bring up the 150
Hogg to Sangakkara, 2 runs a hint of width, cut hard in front of point
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run driven out hard through mid-off
Hogg to Maharoof, no run too good, turned past him from leg and fizzes on past the edge
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run nipped back in from outside off, pushed to the leg side
Bracken to Sangakkara, 2 runs outside off, too wide, Sanga flashes a hard drive out to the covers but it's picked up
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run turns back in from outside off, driven out through mid-on
Bracken to Maharoof, no run pushed across the right hander, a tight one, poked into the covers
Bracken to Maharoof, 1 wide outside off, wide and turning wider, that's a fair call
Bracken to Maharoof, 1 run slower ball on off, there was a mix-up there as both batsmen ended up at the wrong end, Ponting at first slip should have instead thrown to Symonds at the bowler's end
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run turned into the legs now
Hogg to Kulasekara, no run swivels it in on middle and defended forward with a tight bat
Hogg to Kulasekara, no run outside off, driven into the ground and it went up to the covers where Hussey got his body behind it
Hogg to Kulasekara, no run a big appeal for one which pitched outside off and took an edge in front of the pad
Hogg to Kulasekara, no run right over the ball and defends
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run on off, pushes out in front of midwicket
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run driven out to mid-on this time
Bracken to Kulasekara, no run driven out to the covers now
Bracken to Kulasekara, no run right up there on leg, pushed forward at it but a little bit too late on the shot
Bracken to Malinga, no run low full toss, possibly deliberate, pushed out to the covers
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run extraordinary shot, the sort of thing you'd expect from Dhoni, coming down, going to lap sweep and works it over his shoulder
Hogg to Malinga, no run nips back in from outside off, pitches up and is defended back down
Hogg to Malinga, 1 wide attempted flipper ends up wide down leg
Hogg to Malinga, 1 run tossed up on leg, reaches out to sweep it back round to short midwicket
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run worked out to the covers on the front foot
Hogg to Malinga, no run pushed past him outside off
Hogg to Malinga, no run backs away, looking to cut it, misses, the ball goes through and nearly takes the bail, only just wide
Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs swings back in to the right hander, who drives out in front of short midwicket
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run on off, played down off the back foot to mid-off
Johnson to Malinga, no run outside off, and Malinga backs away to try to open up the off-side and doesn't connect - in fact, he's nowhere near connecting
Johnson to Malinga, no run pushed across the right hander again and he backs away once more
Johnson to Malinga, no run round the wicket, it shapes away just at the last moment, too good for the retreating Malinga
Johnson to Malinga, no run again, another play and miss
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run driven out to the covers
Hogg to Malinga, no run the wrong'un's not picked this time
Hogg to Malinga, no run down the track and drives out to mid-on
Hogg to Malinga, no run picks the wrong'un this time but that's still little help as the ball pitches past him
Hogg to Malinga, FOUR runs paddled round in front of midwicket where Haddin tidies up inside the rope, but his hand connects with the rope at the same time
Hogg to Malinga, no run pitches on off and moves away from him, the wrong'un once more
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run outside off, driven back to mid-off
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run big swing in to the left hander who drives out on the leg-side and they settle for one after Malinga sent Sangakkara back
Johnson to Malinga, no run boomeranged back in from outside off, the batsman backs away as is customary this innings, but he's just too wide outside off
Johnson to Malinga, no run more of the same, you sense that all he has to do is land it on the stumps and he will bowl him
Johnson to Malinga, no run full one, towards leg this time - but now it's too much down leg
Lee to Sangakkara, no run follows him down off, Sangakkara looks to try to work it to midwicket
Lee to Sangakkara, no run driven out to wide mid-off now

Lee to Sangakkara, OUT Lee finally gets a wicket which means he's taken a wicket in all international matches this summer. Sangakkara backs away to try to drive to mid-off and is bowled by a swinging yorker which clinks into leg
Thanks for joining me today, do tune in again on Sunday for more from the CB Series.
Huge rapturous applause now for Gilchrist who deserves each and every cheer. Great way to sign off at the WACA.
"I must acknowledge I really felt it [pressure] more than any other game. I'm looking forward to the rest of the series. There's some big games coming up."
"Kumar batted really well. The bowlers did well, too. It's a tough tournament, you have to be ready for the next game."
Gilchrist takes the applause from the crowd who are all on their feet to celebrate his dinal international match at the ground he made his home. What a way to finish, with his 16th ODI ton.
Australia, then, ease to the top of the table after their bowlers proved too much for Sri Lanka's batting line-up, with even Sangakkara finding the pressure too great having made 80.
Australia won by 63 runs
Player of the match is Adam Gilchrist, AUS
